Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when an invalid padding method is
        used.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = b'', b'', b'', 'invalid'
kwargs = {'signing_algorithm': enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.RSA,
    'hashing_algorithm': enums.HashingAlgorithm.SHA_1,
    'digital_signature_algorithm': None}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    "The padding method 'invalid' is not supported for signature verification."
    , engine.verify_signature, *args, **kwargs)
